info.name: Webnovel Dark - PrivateBin Sites
info.description:
Makes PrivateBin sites display similar to webnovel.com by qidian. Dark format.
Sites include: 
    https://paste.imirhil.fr/
    https://jaegers.net/apps/privatebin/
    https://privatebin.net/
    https://paste.warth-hofer.de/
    https://plexle.fi/
    https://paste.fizi.ca/
    https://vim.cx/
